mapper.select: select MKT_CAM_CITY_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, CITY_ID, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_city_rel where MKT_CAM_CITY_REL_ID = #{mktCamCityRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
